hooks.prompt: CAW Session Start: First, silently check if .caw/ directory exists in the current project. If .caw/ does NOT exist, skip all Serena operations and continue normally without any CAW-related actions. If .caw/ EXISTS, then: (1) call check_onboarding_performed() to verify project knowledge availability, (2) if onboarded, load relevant memories (project_onboarding, domain_knowledge, lessons_learned) for context restoration, (3) briefly report available Serena memories to inform the session.
